teaser: First up, Jeffrey Hammond, Vice President and Principal Analyst at Forrester, talks about why Apple's iOS 8.0.1 update will affect so many people. Plus, Ashley Dale, from the Faculty of Engineering at the University of Bristol, stops by to talk about why we're not ready for the next big solar storm. And Melanie Kohnen, a visiting assistant professor of Media, Culture, and Communication at New York University, chats with us about second screen apps.
title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, September 25, 2014
description: First up, Jeffrey Hammond, Vice President and Principal Analyst at Forrester, talks about why Apple's iOS 8.0.1 update will affect so many people. Plus, Ashley Dale, from the Faculty of Engineering at the University of Bristol, stops by to talk about why we're not ready for the next big solar storm. And Melanie Kohnen, a visiting assistant professor of Media, Culture, and Communication at New York University, chats with us about second screen apps.
